content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 3, Borussia Dortmund 2.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 3, Borussia Dortmund 2.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Andriy Yarmolenko replaces Shinji Kagawa.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Marcel Schmelzer.
Attempt blocked. Marcos Llorente (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Shinji Kagawa (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Raphael Guerreiro.
Attempt saved. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marco Asensio.
Offside, Real Madrid. Cristiano Ronaldo tries a through ball, but Sergio Ramos is caught offside.
Goal!  Real Madrid 3, Borussia Dortmund 2. Lucas Vázquez (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Theo Hernández with a headed pass.
Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Ömer Toprak replaces Marc Bartra.
Offside, Real Madrid. Casemiro tries a through ball, but Cristiano Ronaldo is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Casemiro (Real Madrid) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Marco Asensio with a cross.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Marc Bartra.
Attempt blocked. Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dani Ceballos.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Neven Subotic.
Attempt saved. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) header from very close range is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Borja Mayoral with a headed pass.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Marcel Schmelzer.
Attempt missed. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) right footed shot from very close range is too high. Assisted by Marco Asensio with a cross.
Attempt saved. Lucas Vázquez (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Theo Hernández.
Foul by Raphael Guerreiro (Borussia Dortmund).
Lucas Vázquez (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Dani Ceballos (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Lucas Vázquez with a cross.
Attempt saved. Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Marcos Llorente.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Marcos Llorente replaces Isco.
Casemiro (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Pulisic (Borussia Dortmund).

Substitution, Borussia Dortmund. Julian Weigl replaces Nuri Sahin.
Attempt missed. Dani Ceballos (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Isco following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Sokratis.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Sokratis.
Foul by Lucas Vázquez (Real Madrid).
Shinji Kagawa (Borussia Dortmund) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Dani Ceballos replaces Mateo Kovacic.

Goal!  Real Madrid 2, Borussia Dortmund 2. Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Borussia Dortmund) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.

Second Half begins Real Madrid 2, Borussia Dortmund 1.

Isco (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
